name: Summer Rush
description: In this classic click management game you have to manage a beautiful beach resort and make good business in the summer rush! With the majestic sea just feet away, and the sun shining down on you, it’s up to you to tackle tasks and track down a dangerous crook that terrorizes the vacationers. Use your time management talents to gain the trust of everyone on the island and piece together the clues to catch the villan!
